answers.answer: Sounds normal my first baby was 8 lbs .08 oz when she was born and I'm 22 weeks pregnant with my second and I think she might be a big one too!
Sounds like you're right on track... my first was over 6lbs at 35 weeks and she was 9lb6oz when she was born at 41 weeks. Remember, scans can be off up to two pounds either way... good luck!
My doctor said that I don't get another ultrasound. I've only had 2 this whole pregnancy though, a dating one and the gender one.. Is that normal? Or do I need to get another one done?

that sounds about right. i had an ultrasound last week at 36wks and baby was estimated at 6.9 lbs which is about 55th percentile. im only having additional ultrasounds because i gestesinal diabetes so it was to determine whether i needed to be induced or not, sooo happy baby is a normal size and get to carry baby till their ready to come.
I had my son at 37 weeks and he was 6.74 ounces. Completely healthy, no complications at all. So I would think its right.
Id say pretty average sounds like a healthy size to me :)
Thanks ladys im pretty excited to see how big she is when born.... im pretty small an wouldnt of guessed she was already that big worried she is ganna try comeing to early

question: I had my ultrasound an she said my baby was 6lbs an 2oz jw hpw big was yours? Is my baby big now or on the small side?
title: 35 weeks
